name: Major Scale Warm-up
instructions: Sing ascending and descending major scales on 'Ma' syllable. Focus on smooth voice connection and consistent tone throughout your range.

name: Lip Trills with Scales
instructions: Perform lip trills (lip bubbles) while singing major scales. This exercise releases tension and promotes breath flow.

name: Vocal Agility Patterns
instructions: Practice rapid scale passages and arpeggios on various vowels. Start slowly and gradually increase tempo while maintaining clarity.

name: Sustained Tone Exercise
instructions: Hold comfortable pitches for extended periods (10-20 seconds). Focus on steady airflow and consistent volume.

name: Octave Jumps
instructions: Practice jumping between octaves smoothly. Use proper breath support and avoid vocal strain on high notes.

name: Staccato Scales
instructions: Sing scales with short, detached notes. Focus on clean attacks and releases while maintaining good breath support.

name: Vowel Modification Drill
instructions: Practice modifying vowels as you ascend in pitch. Learn to adjust vowel shapes for optimal resonance in different registers.

name: Messa di Voce
instructions: Start soft, gradually crescendo to forte, then diminuendo back to pianissimo on sustained notes. Develops dynamic control.
